title: Villa beach front with slider
description: Villa Callisto is a  contemporarily designed ocean front property, located on the Plai Laem peninsula overlooking Tongson Bay at the northern tip of Koh Samui. Adjacent to 5 star hotels such as Six Senses Hideaway, Melati Beach Resort on Tongson Bay and The Ritz Carlton, it offers two pristine sand beaches and restaurants within walking distance....

title: Villa beach front with slider
description: Pavilions step from shore to sea at this beachfront Koh Samui retreat. Water features set the stage for the home’s 3 saltwater pools and outdoor lounging and dining areas overlooking the ocean. Glass walls fold back to let breezes flow through living and dining areas that pair European pieces with Thai influence. It’s steps to white-sand Bang Por Beach and a short drive to restaurants and shops.

title: Villa beach front with slider
description: The HATCH, Hin Kong Beach, West Coast, Koh Phangan. Welcome to our Romantic Boutique Beach home, charming & well loved with all the modern comforts you could ask for. The Hatch is directly on the ocean in the heart of Hin Kong Bay with breathtaking sea views & sandy feet welcome! Where the ocean & sunsets are literally at your door In one of the Islands most loved destinations, one of the few places on the island with easy access to all.A perfect calming holiday home right on the water!....
